history.proof: intros F H. qsimpl use: monotonic,wmonotonic,increasing. apply mkwmon. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - qauto use: evolve_incl unfold: evolve_t, evolve, simulation_t, evolve_a inv: Lbl.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce wmonotonic to an evaluable reference.

exceptions.tactic: intros R S H0 H1 H2 H3.
apply (wmon_a A X Y TX TY F H).
exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.
The reference H0 was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply (mon_m A X Y TX TY F H).
exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

exceptions.tactic: apply (UExp_mon A X Y TX TY F H).
exceptions.exn: The reference H was not found in the current environment.
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros F H. unfold wmonotonic, monotonic, increasing in *. intros R S H0 H1 H2 H3. apply mkwmon. - apply (wmon_a A X Y TX TY F H). apply H0. - apply (mon_m A X Y TX TY F H). apply H1. - apply (UExp_mon A X Y TX TY F H). apply H2.
